00028 class Fl_Device {
00029 protected:
00030   int type_;
00031   uchar bg_r_, bg_g_, bg_b_; // color for background and/or mixing if particular device does not support masking and/or alpha
00032   friend void fl_rect(int x, int y, int w, int h);

00052   friend void fl_polygon(int x0, int y0, int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2, int x3, int y3);
00053   friend void fl_concat();
00054   friend void fl_reconcat();
00055   friend void fl_begin_points();
00056   friend void fl_begin_line();
00057   friend void fl_begin_loop();
00058   friend void fl_begin_polygon();

00073   friend void fl_push_no_clip();
00074   friend void fl_pop_clip();
00075   friend void fl_begin_complex_polygon();
00076   friend void fl_gap();

00125   virtual void push_no_clip();
00126   virtual void pop_clip();
00127   // Images
00128   virtual   void draw_image(const uchar*, int,int,int,int, int delta=3, int ldelta=0);
00129   virtual   void draw_image_mono(const uchar*, int,int,int,int, int delta=1, int ld=0);
00130   virtual   void draw_image(Fl_Draw_Image_Cb, void*, int,int,int,int, int delta=3);
00131   virtual   void draw_image_mono(Fl_Draw_Image_Cb, void*, int,int,int,int, int delta=1);
00132   // Image classes
00133   virtual   void draw(Fl_Pixmap * pxm,int XP, int YP, int WP, int HP, int cx, int cy);
00134   virtual   void draw(Fl_RGB_Image * rgb,int XP, int YP, int WP, int HP, int cx, int cy);
00135   virtual   void draw(Fl_Bitmap * bmp,int XP, int YP, int WP, int HP, int cx, int cy);

00138   enum device_types { 
00139     xlib_display = 0, quartz_display, gdi_display, 
00140     gdi_printer = 256, quartz_printer, postscript_device 
00141   };
00145   int type() {return type_;};
00151   virtual Fl_Device *set_current();
00152   
00153   virtual ~Fl_Device() {};

00158   static Fl_Device *current();
00159   
00163   static Fl_Display *display_device() { return fl_display_device; };
